title: 출장마사지의 목적
overview: Min-seok, who is always tired after work, decides to start exercising and asks his assistant manager Yoon-soo, who works at the same company, for some tips. As Min-seok begins working out, he finds it difficult to keep up due to his lack of stamina. Feeling down, he enjoys a pleasant drink with Yoon-soo. Impressed by Min-seok's effort, Yoon-soo makes a call and arranges a special business trip massage service for him. Later, both of them receive a 2-on-1 massage service at home from two beautiful women.
